definition: addicted to/fond of/stem corresponding to -phil or -phile
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The suspect is a Spartan dog but he is surprisingly gentle to his little son.
sentences.chinese: 那个嫌疑犯嗜杀成性，但对自己的小儿子却异常温柔。

sentences.english: The general is a real butcher.
sentences.chinese: 那将军是个嗜杀成性的人。

definition: lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
debts of blood crying out for retribution
see 桀驁不馴|桀骜不驯[jie2 ao4 bu4 xun4]
